messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] OT: MS info
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Katherine, I m happy to see you take an interest in your niece s condition. I have MS and I often wish that my closest and dearest paid more attention at
messages.messageBody:
Hi Katherine,

I'm happy to see you take an interest in your niece's condition. I
have MS and I often wish that my closest and dearest paid more
attention at times. A great place to start would be to join the
friendswithMS group on yahoogroups. Just send a blank email to
friendswithMS-subscribe@yahoogroups.com . They are a great bunch of
people and have a wealth of information. They'd be the ideal people
to get you the information you need.

GOod luck!

Laura

At 09:40 AM 03/02/2009, you wrote:

>Hi. My niece has had MS for years and has done well for a long time. She
>is now at a point where she needs more information. I don't know if the
>people who used to post occasionally about the online research they had done
>on MS are still reading here.
>
>Please email me offlist if you have anything that could be helpful.
>
>Thanks
>~Katherine
>
>[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
>
>

messages.subject: OT: MS info
messages.msgSnippet: Hi.  My niece has had MS for years and has done well for a long time.  She is now at a point where she needs more information.  I don t know if the people who
messages.messageBody:
Hi. My niece has had MS for years and has done well for a long time. She
is now at a point where she needs more information. I don't know if the
people who used to post occasionally about the online research they had done
on MS are still reading here.

Please email me offlist if you have anything that could be helpful.

Thanks
~Katherine


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
